item.title: Defensive Distillation
item.description: An exploration of defensive distillation techniques to protect neural networks against adversarial attacks

item.title: About
item.description: I studied Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from 2019 to 2024 at the Coimbatore Institute of Technology, and started working as a AI Engineer soon after. Experience RocketFrog.ai 06/24 - present | India AI researcher/Engineer Hiaido 04/24 - 06/24 | India AI Engineer Sayvai 06/23 - 05/24 | India AI Researcher/Engineer Bosch Global Software Technologies 07/22 - 12/22 | India AI/ML Intern Education Coimbatore Institute of Technology 2019 - 2024
